title: Bug 43150Tomcat and path with pound sign ()  ClassNotFoundException
description: the same applies to version 5.5 and probably earlier versions too.thanks!
OB: Bug 43150Tomcat and path with pound sign ()ClassNotFoundException Tomcat will not start if it's located and launched from a path with a(pound)character somewhere. You'll find all informations in the given mailthread ontomcatuser, including some developer specific informations.One part of the problem is the usage of File.toURL in URLClassloader...I'd really appreciate it if this problem could be fixed/worked around (seemailthread for hints).btw.
